title: Loot after getting punished xd
body:
I got a bit salty the other night when playing really late and kinda got myself chat restricted xD first thing since like end of season 4 but what i want to know is do you ever get the loot back after the punishment. fyi i know there will be people that say toxic but I'm honestly not lmao it was just a bad time i guess lmao :) have fun!

When i say that, after the game it tells me that i am not able to get loot after games from a previous behavioural punishment

replies.body:
You will start earning loot back eventually (provided you receive no further punishments) but the time it takes is variable by account/punishment. For a chat restriction, probably not very long (someone on 10 game got their rewards back in a week).

The deets of it is basically, there is no set time, but you're on a low punishment tier so it shouldn't take too long. Show positive behaviour and you'll get em back real quick, neutral behaviour it'll take a little longer and negative behaviour not until you stop said behaviour.

You can read more about the restrictions here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463
